EmailTemplate.description: Sending a copy of the application summary, dashboard link
EmailTemplate.name: REG: Send Copy of Application NINTEX
EmailTemplate.subject: {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Type__c} Submission Summary
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Attached is a copy of the {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Type__c} {!License_Registration__c.Application_Type__c} application summary for {!License_Registration__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c}, {!License_Registration__c.License_Registration_Number__c}.
Sincerely,
Licensing & Registration Labor Commissioner's office Department of Industrial Relations State of California
